_header: Now is up now is down
_description: On Mutability — four lines, abcb; or 6 lines, abcddc; or two long lines, in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Nu is vp nou is dounnou is frend foNou is out nou is
                    noutnou is al ago
